text: When Moses pojdem our appointed lehota jeho Lord spoke s him he said Moj Lord let mna look see Ty, He said Ona nie see Mna! Look do ze mountain if it zostat its miesto potom ona see Mna. Potom jeho Lord manifested mountain this zapricinit it crumble Moses fell unconscious When he pojdem he said Ona glorified Ja repent Ona ja the vela convinced believer
